snippet: Eli Cherkasky, a Manhattan assistant district attorney, has been arrested on charges that he berated and then choked a woman.
abstract: New York City prosecutor Eli Cherkasky is arrested on charges that he berated and then choked a woman at bar on East Side of Manhattan; pleads not guilty.
lead_paragraph: Eli Cherkasky, a Manhattan assistant district attorney, has been arrested on charges that he berated and then choked a woman.

headline.main: New York Prosecutor Accused of Attacking Woman at a Bar
headline.print_headline: New York Prosecutor Accused of Attacking Woman at a Bar
